price: Wọ́n sọ pé: “A fi Allāhu búra, ìwọ kò yé rántí Yūsuf títí o máa fi di yánnayànna tàbí (títí) o máa fi di ara àwọn òkú.”
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ تَفۡتَؤُاْ تَذۡكُرُ يُوسُفَ حَتَّىٰ تَكُونَ حَرَضًا أَوۡ تَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡهَٰلِكِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi tafta-u tadhkuru yūsufa ḥattā takūna ḥaraḍan aw takūna mina al-hālikīna
